document.full_text: china plans to support its integrated circuit sector as a strategically important industry over the next five years, aiming for over a fourth of microchips used in the country by 2015 to be made in china, xinhua news agency said on saturday.
document.title: china to give "strategic" support to microchip sector: xinhua
lines_and_colors: china plans to support its integrated circuit sector as a strategically important industry over the next five years, aiming for over a fourth of microchips used in the country by 2015 to be made in china, xinhua news agency said on saturday.
